front.title: Inter-AS Option B between NVO3 and BGP/MPLS IP VPN network

abstract.t: This draft describes option-B inter-as connection between NVO3 network and MPLS/IP VPN network. Comparing to traditional Option-B inter-as connection defined in [RFC 4364], this draft provides enhancement for heterogeneous network multi-as connection, the control plane and data plane procedures in NVO3 network are newly designed.
